titles.title: A bill to delay the implementation of the individual health coverage mandate under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
A bill to delay the implementation of the individual health coverage mandate under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, as amended by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, to delay until 2015 the requirement that individuals maintain minimal essential health care coverage.
